Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Tonight \To*night"\, adv. [Prep. to + night] 1. On this present or coming night. [1913 Webster]
2. On the last night past. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Tonight \To*night"\, n. The present or the coming night; the night after the present day. [1913 Webster]
tonight n : the present or immediately coming night adv : during the night of the present day; "drop by tonight" [syn: {this evening}, {this night}]
